text:
I’ve been to consult Dr Vivien Lim (Endocrinology) three times. Scheduled for another visit in a couple of months’ time.

She is fast, no nonsense and efficient - that may be why some of the reviews are critical without the benefit of details.

She, like me, does not waste time or suffer fools. She’s not there to hold your hands when she has a waiting room full of patients waiting their turns.
She just goes for the evident , no nonsense diagnosis and helped me get healthy. Though I couldn’t continue going to her due to travelling. I realised I was able to address my health issues better.

Dr Vivien Lim is very professional and detailed in her diagnosis and treatment for my diabetes condition. She has helped me to greatly improve my condition, including losing 20kg of weight! A sincere and caring doctor who focuses on the patient's well being. Charges are also reasonable. Highly recommended!
Very negative experience. I do not recommend. Unprofessional and questionable behavior.
Rude and condescending, better to suffer with whatever disease than see this kind of doctor,  I said what I said.
